Going Against the Flow: Chapter 8-
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Completed Epics Section II: Going Against the Flow: Chapter 8-
By Celious on Saturday, May 20, 2000 - 04:34 pm:

Moo stood in front of a mirror in his study. A glass of red wine sat in his right hand. He slowly sloshed the liquid in the glass.
"So. Another dares to challenge me."
The glass in his hand started to vibrate, then shattered. The mirror exploded into small glass fragments as invisible energies blasted it.
"The fools have no idea who they're toying with. I think it's time they finally saw the truth..."
Moo turned, his cape lighty brushing the ground. He walked from his study into the library. He faced a wall and his eyes glowed. It slowly opened up into a secret room, adorned with candles and evil artifacts. A pool of quicksilver sat in the middle of the floor. Walked over to the pool and waved his hand over it. The liquid metal shimmered and a face appeared in it. It was the image of Doran, a loyal human follower that owned a colliseum in the city of Kisa.
"Doran."
Doran bowed his head in the traditional greeting Moo's followers gave their master.
"Master Moo..to what do I owe this visit from my master?"
"Has Pyre and Yorin done their duty, Doran?"
Doran bowed again.
"Yes Master...Thank you. The girl has died, and the monster will be sent to the market holding area..."
Moo smiled. The plan was working rather splendedly...soon he will have a powerful new soldier, if things worked out right. Pyre the Dragon and Yorin the Reaper has done well. He should reward them for their work.
"Doran. How long will it take for the monster to get into your care?"
"Please be patient, Master Moo...any day now..."
Moo's eyes glowed red.
"You dare to order me?!"
Doran shivered.
"Of course not Master Moo! Please forgive me!"
Doran's head lowered in reverence.
"No matter. Make sure you are able to do this right, Doran, if you value your life."
The image on the mercury vanished. Moo smiled, pleased at how everything was going. New soldiers were being made at a record pace, and his hold throughout the lands was getting stronger every day.
"But that damn Leo and his group."
Moo's eyes glowed blue, and the mercury showed an image of Rys and his group, walking through the woods. They were close to the town of Kisa..what a coincidence. This could work out better than he hoped.
"Open up space and time, this spell is my rhyme. Take from another plane, an Omega to help my reign."
The mercury slowly started to rise, and moved over the pool to hover over the ground. It slowly took the form of an Omega. It's large eye illuminated to life. It spoke in a slightly loud robotic voice.
"Destructive Effigy of Ancient civil Nations..DEAN...activated. All systems functioning. Programmer recognised as MOO. Awaiting instructions."
Moo had the image of Rys and group appear in the mercury pool.
"You are to terminate these monsters with utmost haste and precision."
The Omega scans the images of Rys, Lorin, Rorik, and Silve into his memory banks.
"Objective recieved. Destroy and eliminate targets."
The Omega started to shimmer, and his form started to slim into a thin vertical line. It then vanished. Moo turned on his heel and walked away to get another glass of blood wine.
